activation.reactionTrigger: Attacked by a creature within reach.

system.description: In response to an attack from a creature within reach, make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature and expend a dose of basic poison. On a hit, the creature must make a Constitution save or for the next minute, whenever it would make a melee attack, take the Dash action, or make a Strength or Dexterity check, it takes 2d6 acid damage. This effect can be ended early by administering an antitoxin.
